name: The Lost Agates Gems
description:
The Agates gems were stolen from the Temples of Balance. These gems were then used to corrupt anything you could possibly imagine. Luckily you have managed to get a hold of some of these gems to restore balanced to the corrupted. We were able to provide a small snapshot of your journey and you're able to face these corrupt beings and restore the duality that has been disturbed.

Controls Left/Right Arrow - Move Spacebar - Jump Shoot - X Dash - Z Warning: there are some bugs that may be present!! No extinguisher available!!

Currently no music has been implemented to due to time constraints XD

Source code: https://github.com/mikelee53/The-Lost-Agates-Gems
